Group 0A example:
./rds_encoder -g 0A -pi 2222 -pty 12 -tp 1 -ms 1 -ta 0 -af 101.2,99.9 -ps "Evropa 2"
./rds_decoder -b 

Group 0A encoder adds padding spaces, decoder removes them:
./rds_encoder -g 0A -pi 1234 -pty 10 -tp 1 -ms 1 -ta 0 -af 100.2,97.4 -ps "Test"
./rds_decoder -b 

Group 2A example:
./rds_encoder -g 2A -pi 3333 -pty 3 -tp 1 -rt "Now playing The Emptiness Machine by Linkin Park" -ab 1
./rds_decoder -b
